page.title: 07Recreation
page.content: In a household survey we asked which sports do people play regularly. Swimming was top of the list by far. Badminton ,football,squash,snooker and athletics were also very popular. Sailing, rugby ,tennis,golf and cricket were quite popular.55% of the households had club or team members living in them.Many people travel out of the area to take part in their sport.They go to Frodsham,Runcorn, Chester,Helsby,Wrexham, Abersoch, Bala or even Leeds.The most popular spectator sports are football,rugby and tennis but snooker,cricket and athletics are also popular. In our block the only sports facility is for the cricket club and they play at Ashton Hayes.Soon there will be a badminton court in the Comunity Centre.
